part_description: Four horizontal drawers stacked vertically, equal size, front-facing handles.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out on metal tracks, allowing smooth movement. The drawers fit snugly within the cabinet frame, preventing misalignment. The handles are attached firmly to the front of each drawer, enabling easy access.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or in a corner, used for storing items. People can pull the drawers using the handles to access contents. The flat top surface can hold additional objects like a lamp or decor.
